name: nest-pret-schematics
description: Schematics for scaffolding a Nest Pret App.
author: Ricardo Simioni

scripts.postbuild: npm run --silent copyJson && npm run --silent copyRoot && npm run --silent copyFiles && npm run --silent copySrc && npm run --silent copyTests && npm run --silent copyScripts && npm run --silent copyOverrides
scripts.copyRoot: find $(realpath $(dirname $0)/../) -type f -maxdepth 1 ! -name .env ! -name .env.example ! -name .npmignore ! -name package.json ! -name LICENSE -exec cp {} dist/application/files/ts/ \;
scripts.prep: npm run --silent build && npm version patch
scripts.prep:minor: npm run --silent build && npm version minor
scripts.prep:major: npm run --silent build && npm version major
